akn:content.akn:p:
§ 101936. Regulations As soon as practicable after the effective date of this subchapter, the Secretary shall promulgate regulations appropriate for its implementation. (Added Pub. L. 114–289, title VII, § 701, Dec. 16, 2016, 130 Stat. 1493.)
Editorial Notes
References in TextThe effective date of this subchapter, referred to in text, probably means the date of enactment of Pub. L. 114–289, which enacted this subchapter and was approved Dec. 16, 2016.
